name: Drank Matrix Elixir
desc: You're suffering the effects of drinking the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's effects finally wear off.

name: Pink Elixir
desc: You drank the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's effects fade and are replaced with a gnawing weakness.

name: Pink Elixir Aftereffects
desc: You're suffering the aftereffects of drinking the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's aftereffects finally wear off.

name: Gray Elixir
desc: You drank the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's effects fade and darkness creeps in at the edges of your vision.

desc: You're suffering the aftereffects of drinking the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's aftereffects finally wear off.

desc: You drank the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's effects fade and your muscles twitch.

desc: You're suffering the aftereffects of drinking the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's aftereffects finally wear off.

desc: You drank the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's effects fade and your vision warps.

desc: You're suffering the aftereffects of drinking the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's aftereffects finally wear off.

desc: You drank the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's effects fade and are replaced with a burning heat.

desc: You're suffering the aftereffects of drinking the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's aftereffects finally wear off.

name: Yellow Elixir

remove_message: The concoction's effects fade and you suddenly feel like something is pressing down on you.

desc: You're suffering the aftereffects of drinking the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's aftereffects finally wear off.

desc: You drank the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's effects fade and it gets hard to think straight.

desc: You're suffering the aftereffects of drinking the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's aftereffects finally wear off.

name: Blue Elixir
desc: You drank the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's effects fade and you suddenly feel stretched, like something unseen is pulling at you.

name: Blue Elixir Aftereffects
desc: You're suffering the aftereffects of drinking the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's aftereffects finally wear off.

name: Green Elixir
desc: You drank the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's effects fade and you stagger as you suddenly feel faint.

name: Green Elixir Aftereffects
desc: You're suffering the aftereffects of drinking the concentrated matrix crystal concoction.
remove_message: The concoction's aftereffects finally wear off.

name: Noetic Resilience
desc: You are fortified against too strong a connection with the Nether.
remove_message: Your protection against too much connection to the Nether fades away.

name: Noetically Fragile
desc: Your psionic capacity, and physical stamina, are reduced by the aftereffects of the noetic resilience treatment.
apply_message: You feel a sudden weakness in your body.
remove_message: You feel your strength and ability to channel your powers finally return to normal.
